title: 15: S2E15 – "Lying in Wait” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Ryan Haddon, Jimmy V., Keith Daniels, and an anonymous author, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about the dark side of slumber, with tales about noisy nightmares, hidden horrors, watchful wraiths, and descents into darkness. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e15
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
